Who Will Be The Next GOP VP Pick?

Editor's note: This story has been updated with additional names as they emerged. Update: May 5, 2016: With Ted Cruz and John Kasich dropping out of the presidential race in quick succession, the GOP field is left with one candidate remaining: Donald Trump. There's already plenty of talk about whom the presumptive ...

Lilli Petersen

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Lilli Petersen
article_metadata.description: Starbucks locations in Seattle have partnered with the police's Safe Places Program to provide LGBTQ individuals protection from hate crimes and harassment

og.description: Every Starbucks in Seattle is about to provide much more than just lattes and toasted muffins. Last week, the coffee chain announced a partnership with the Seattle Police Department’s Safe Place Program to provide a haven for LGBTQ victims of harassment and hate crimes in each of its locations
og.title: Starbucks Is Providing Safe Spaces For LGBTQ Individuals In Seattle

article_metadata.sailthru.title: Starbucks Sets Up "Safe Spaces" For LGBTQ Individuals In Seattle
